Person.description: Overworked and underappreciated at her IT job, Suzy's 'friends' have made her a profile with the hopes of finding much needed stress relief.
Hellooooooo!!! I'm Amy! I am a balloon engineer at a new startup in LA. I don't have an inflated ego though XD I have a fear of needles and heights.
Person.feedItems: Thank god for coffee to keep me awake!
